unnormalised: Exciting transfer window! Surprised to see Gurpreet sign with East Bengal. Heard Mohun Bagan offered Rs. 2 Cr but the lure of Kolkata proved strong, much like in Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge. What are your thoughts on Jamshedpur FC's midfield revamp? Could they challenge for the ISL title after their 1500 km journey? All eyes on the Durand Cup!
